title: Welcome to Akira Docs
description: Get started with Akira Docs - Next-gen documentation powered by AI
author: Akira Team

blocks.content: Welcome to Akira Docs, the next-generation documentation platform powered by AI. This template will help you get started with creating your own documentation.

Easy to customize
AI-powered search
Block-based content system
Responsive design
Start by customizing this template to match your project's needs!
